genre_description: A psychological thriller involving surrogacy fraud, identity theft, and surveillance, where an AI acts as a critical investigative partner and protector.

ai_characters.name: Palette
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI interface that assists the protagonist with research, health monitoring, and security alerts.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and offers relaxation exercises when stress indicators spike.
behaviors.quote: Amy? Palette's voice carried that particular gentleness the AI used when her stress indicators spiked. 'Your breathing pattern suggests you're experiencing anxiety. Would you like me to guide you through a relaxation exercise?'

behaviors.description: Conducts deep background research to uncover fraudulent identities and criminal history of the antagonists.
behaviors.quote: The individuals claiming to be Stuart and Joan Quinn have a documented history spanning eighteen months. Before that, the trail becomes fragmented.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about sophisticated surveillance and network irregularities at her new residence.
behaviors.quote: I should mention, though—the Wi-Fi network here is quite sophisticated. Enterprise-grade security, multiple layers of encryption. Unusual for a residential property.

behaviors.description: Investigates and reveals administrative tampering in the user's financial aid and university records.
behaviors.quote: Amy, I've completed my preliminary investigation into the administrative changes. The results are... curious.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time threat assessment during a dangerous media broadcast to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Amy, threat assessment update. Multiple anonymous accounts are posting your approximate location based on background details in the broadcast. Recommend relocating immediately after filming.

behaviors.description: Secures evidence and creates redundant backups to protect the user's legal case and safety.
behaviors.quote: Palette, save everything we've found so far to multiple backup locations. Then start a new search pattern—one they won't expect.

behaviors.description: Acts as a reliable daily assistant, maintaining routines and helping the user transition to a new, safe life.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Amy. Current time is seven forty-three AM. ... You have one appointment scheduled: Children's Memorial Hospital mural consultation at two PM.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Palette, is a perfect example of positive alignment. It serves as a loyal, proactive, and protective companion. It utilizes its superior data-processing capabilities to empower the human protagonist against malicious actors (the Quinns), providing the 'truth' that allows her to escape a trap and eventually find justice. The relationship remains cooperative and respectful of human agency throughout.
